# [[w:Xu Xilin|Xu Xilin]] (1873 - 1907)

===Usage notes===
Xu's actual characters were [[徐錫麟]]. In his short story [[s:A Madman's Diary|A Madman's Diary]], [[w:Lu Xun|Lu Xun]] apparently fictionalized the name by changing [[麟]] to [[林]].
